title: Instructional Design and Stakeholder Engagement Strategies for Enhancing Quality in Large-Scale Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience in Distance Education and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: A course addressing social demands and institutional improvement needs due to the expansion of non-face-to-face education post-COVID-19.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three determining factors of remote education quality by analyzing survey results.
Learners can design a simulation for collaboration strategies among stakeholders (instructors/tech support teams/peer learners) in online learning environments.
Learners can suggest improvements for learner satisfaction using VR-based formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
